Articles.Content: Yay! Quad-core, 8GB of RAM. Should be good enough for KSP? Now I have more RAM than my last Mac, I'll be able to install MOAR MODS! Yay! I'll be starting up my mission reports again! (Link in Sig)

KSP doesn't care about quad-core and something tells me it won't care about that much memory, either. But I might be wrong.

The most important thing for KSP is how fast your CPU is and how well your graphic card solves problems. If you have that taken care of, KSP will look great.
The graphics card is of limited interest. Most important by far is the CPU single threaded speed.
